greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = the least k > n for which A264977(k) = A264977(n), or 0 if no such k exists.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: (define (A277816 n) (if (zero? n) n (let ((v (A264977 n))) (let loop ((k (+ 1 n))) (if (= v (A264977 k)) k (loop (+ 1 k)))))))
xref: Cf. A277701, A277712, A277713, A277715 (iterates of this sequence starting from 1, 2, 3 and 9 respectively).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 06 2016
